thing-type.description: HomeSeer Z-Wave Plus Motion Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtMotion sensor can be included and operated in any Z-Wave network with other Z-Wave certified devices. <br /&gtThe features list:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtZ-Wave Plus certified for wide compatibility (500 serials product)</li&gt <li&gtSupports security 0 and security 2 protected mode with AES-128 encryption.</li&gt <li&gtMotion sensor.</li&gt <li&gtTamper alarm by shock sensor.</li&gt <li&gtThe battery life is up to 1 year.</li&gt <li&gtLow battery alarm.</li&gt <li&gtSupport firmware OTA.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtOpen the cover</li&gt <li&gtPlace the device withing the direct range of your Z-Wave controller</li&gt <li&gtSet the main controller into inclusion mode <ol&gt<li&gt"Secure Inclusion". Hold Z-button for 5 sec and then release. The LED indicator should blink fast.</li&gt <li&gt"Non-secure Inclusion". Press Z-button once. The LED indicator should blink fast.</li&gt </ol&gt</li&gt <li&gtWait for the adding process to end</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtOpen the cover</li&gt <li&gtPlace the device withing the direct range of your Z-Wave controller</li&gt <li&gtSet the main controller into exclusion mode <ol&gt<li&gtTriple click Z-button quickly. The LED indicator should blink fast.</li&gt </ol&gt</li&gt <li&gtWait for the removing process to end</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress and hold Z button for more than 5 seconds and release</p&gt
